resources.string: This Sharier App is a very simple app help you to upload your Image and video file to the cloud.This file are compressed and then upload. You can share this file with any one.This User guide will help you to use this App easily.

In order to upload your data Click on Navigation Drawer--> Create Folder Your default folder name is Folder1 You can change it, upload some Image to create your cloud folder successfully now on back pressed you can view your Folder on clicking in on the folder you can upload your images and videos inside the folder

In order find other users data you need the Folder Name of other users Click on Navigation Drawer--> User List search the users by the username Now .Now click on the username and provide the folder name now you can find the file inside the folder if that folder exist in the user account
